name: Kill the Gobbies
description:
This is our Ludum Dare 41 submission, combine 2 incompatible genres. We decided to do a single player MMO. 

Credits,

klnrnbkr - UI, Code

ethzspectre - Code, World Creation

Coven370 - Models, Animation

Currently in development, but on hold for a few days to weeks for school, and other personal projects but we want to get this to a playable state ASAP.
